scripts.test: npm run test:generate && npm run test:snapshot
scripts.test:snapshot: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const generated = fs.readFileSync('./generated/handlers.ts', 'utf8'); const snapshot = fs.readFileSync('./snapshots/handlers.snapshot.ts', 'utf8'); if (generated === snapshot) { console.log('✅ Snapshot test passed'); process.exit(0); } else { console.log('❌ Snapshot test failed'); process.exit(1); }"
